context: I'm good! My brother is coming to visit and I want to queue up some good old fashioned monster movies for him. Any suggestions?
It could also be a modern version of an old fashioned monster movie, or something that has them in it. For example, The Cabin in the Woods is a good example of a modern monster movie.
Well, Monster (2008) isn't really the type of movie I was looking for. Isn't that the one with Charleze Theron?
I haven't seen Pacific Rim (2013) . Is it a monster movie?
resp: Yes it is! Have you seen Creature of the Walking Dead (1965)
